name: Aspect Star "N"
description:
The original Aspect Star comes to your Nintendo Entertainment System! Aspect Star "N" is an action game with nine levels and inter-level cutscenes where you utilize the three aspects to defeat your enemies and move on to the next stage.

Meet Nicole, and see how she and her stuffed animal friend Zip go and defeat an evil alliance that has formed among the enemies of cats! Can Nicole save the day?
